title: AWS Console Mobile Application
content:
AWS Console Mobile Application
Skip to main content
English
Contact us
Support
My account
Filter: All
Sign in
Create Account
AWS Management Console
Overview
Features
Mobile Application
FAQs
Management and Governance›
Management Console›
Mobile Application
AWS Console Mobile Application
Stay connected to your AWS resources on the go
Download the Console Mobile Application
The AWS Console Mobile Application, provided by Amazon Web Services, lets you view and manage a select set of resources and receive push notifications to stay informed and connected with your AWS resources while on-the-go.
What is the Console Mobile Application?
The Console Mobile Application allows you to configure and receive push notifications for AWS services, monitor resources through a dedicated dashboard, and view configuration details, metrics, and alarms for select AWS services.
Dashboard
The Dashboard provides permitted users with an overview of the account status, with real-time data on Amazon CloudWatch, AW

An amazing week of learning and doing
From newsworthy keynotes to career-changing sessions and connections, re:Invent 2024 was an amazing success—and we can’t wait to do it again. Registration for re:Invent 2025 opens this summer. Subscribe for updates.

Explore complex architectures, learn intricate deployment strategies, and uncover the inner workings of AWS services with the experts who built them.

AWS 요금은 어떻게 작동합니까?
AWS는 방대한 클라우드 서비스에 대해 사용량에 따른 요금 접근 방식을 제공합니다. AWS에서는 장기 계약이나 복잡한 라이선스 없이 필요한 개별 서비스에 대해 사용한 만큼만 비용을 지불하면 됩니다. AWS 요금은 수도세나 전기세와 같은 공과금을 납부하는 방식과 비슷합니다. 사용한 서비스에 대한 요금만 지불하고 사용을 중단하더라도 추가 비용이나 종료 비용이 없습니다.

title: Sign in with AWS Builder ID - AWS Sign-In
content:
Sign in with AWS Builder ID - AWS Sign-InSign in with AWS Builder ID - AWS Sign-InDocumentationAWS Sign-InUser GuideRegion availabilitySign in with AWS Builder IDAWS Builder ID is a personal profile that provides access to select tools and services including
Amazon CodeCatalyst, Amazon Q Developer, and AWS Training and Certification. AWS Builder ID represents
you as an individual and is independent from any credentials and data you may have in existing
AWS accounts. Like other personal profiles, AWS Builder ID remains with you as you progress through
your personal, educational, and career goals.Your AWS Builder ID complements any AWS accounts you may already own or want to create. While an
AWS account acts as a container for AWS resources you create and provides a security boundary
for those resources, your AWS Builder ID represents you as an individual. For more information, see
AWS Builder ID and other AWS credentials.AWS Builder ID is free. You only pay for the AWS resources you con

See all new and updated Knowledge Center articles published in the last month and re:Post’s top contributors./How do I recover a lost or forgotten AWS password?lg.../How do I recover a lost or forgotten AWS password?3 minute read0I lost or forgot the password that I use to sign in to AWS and want to recover or change my password.Resolution
How you recover a lost or forgotten password depends on how you sign in to AWS. To reset a password, you must have one of the following:
Your AWS account email address that you used to create the account as th

content:
Learn what AWS bills mean when you don't have an account | AWS re:PostBy using AWS re:Post, you agree to the AWS re:Post Terms of Usere:PostSearchEnglishEnglishDeutschEspañolFrançaisItaliano日本語한국어Português中文 (简体)中文 (繁體)ResourcesSign inHomeQuestionsKnowledge CenterArticlesSelectionsTagsTopicsCommunity GroupsAWS Support OfficialAWS Trust & Safety CenterAsk questionKnowledge Center Monthly Newsletter - March 2025Stay up to date with the latest from the Knowledge Center. See all new and updated Knowledge Center articles published in the last month and re:Post’s top contributors./Why was I charged by Amazon Web Services when I don't have an AWS account?lg.../Why was I charged by Amazon Web Services when I don't have an AWS account?2 minute read0I received a bill for AWS, but I don't have an account.Resolution
First, make sure that the charges were from AWS. If your payment method is billed, then the payment method is associated with an account that has running resources.

title: Sign in to the AWS Management Console as the root user - AWS Sign-In
content:
Sign in to the AWS Management Console as the root user - AWS Sign-InSign in to the AWS Management Console as the root user - AWS Sign-InDocumentationAWS Sign-InUser GuideTo sign in as the root userAdditional informationSign in to the AWS Management Console as the
root userWhen you first create an AWS account, you begin with one sign-in identity that has complete access to all AWS services
and resources in the account. This identity is called the AWS account root user and is accessed by
signing in with the email address and password that you used to create the account.ImportantWe strongly recommend that you don't use the root user for your everyday tasks. Safeguard your root user credentials and use them to
perform the tasks that only the root user can perform. For the complete list of tasks that require you to sign in as the root user, see Tasks that require root user credentials in the IAM User Guide.
To sign in as the root user
You can sign in as the root user while you are already s

title: Sign in to the AWS Management Console as an IAM user - AWS Sign-In
content:
Sign in to the AWS Management Console as an IAM user - AWS Sign-InSign in to the AWS Management Console as an IAM user - AWS Sign-InDocumentationAWS Sign-InUser GuideTo sign in as an IAM userSign in to the AWS Management Console as an
IAM userAn IAM user is an identity created within an AWS account that has permission to
interact with AWS resources. IAM users sign-in using their account ID or alias, their user
name, and a password. IAM user names are configured by your administrator. IAM user names can
be either friendly names, such as Zhang, or email addresses such as
zhang@example.com. IAM user names can't include spaces, but can
include upper and lower case letters, numbers, and the symbols + = , . @ _ -. Tip If your IAM user has multi-factor authentication (MFA) enabled, you must have access to
the authentication device. For details, see Using MFA devices with your IAM sign-in
page.
To sign in as an IAM user
You can sign in as an IAM user while you are already signed in to another

To reinstate your account that's suspended because of outstanding charges, pay all past due charges in the AWS Billing and Cost Management console.

Important:
For closed accounts that were linked to an organization, use the organization's management account to submit the request to reopen the account.

title: Sign in to the AWS Management Console - AWS Sign-In
content:
Sign in to the AWS Management Console - AWS Sign-InSign in to the AWS Management Console - AWS Sign-InDocumentationAWS Sign-InUser GuideSign in to the AWS Management ConsoleWhen you sign in to the AWS Management Console from the main AWS sign-in URL (https://console.aws.amazon.com/) you must choose your user type, either Root user or IAM user. If you're not sure
what kind of user you are, see Determine your user type. The root user has unrestricted account access and is associated with the person who created the
AWS account. The root user then creates other types of users, such as IAM users and
users in AWS IAM Identity Center, and assigns them access credentials.An IAM user
is an identity within your AWS account that has specific custom permissions. When an IAM user
signs in, they can use a sign-in URL that includes their AWS account or alias, such as
https://account_alias_or_id.signin.aws.amazon.com/console/
instead of the main AWS sign in URL https://console.aws.amazon.com/.You can

LAS VEGAS, NV

An amazing week of learning and doing
From newsworthy keynotes to career-changing sessions and connections, re:Invent 2024 was an amazing success—and we can’t wait to do it again. Registration for re:Invent 2025 opens this summer. Subscribe for updates.
Subscribe
2024 event content
The learning continues
Keynotes
Hear all the announcements and find out what’s top-of-mind for AWS leaders including Matt Garman, CEO of AWS, and Andy Jassy, Amazon president and CEO.
Watch on demand
Innovation talks
Get strategic vision and practical application from AWS leaders and customers who are using cutting-edge AWS services to drive innovation.
Watch on demand
Breakout sessions
Explore complex architectures, learn intricate deployment strategies, and uncover the inner workings of AWS services with the experts who built them.

title: AWS re:Invent 2024 Watch on demand  |  Amazon Web Services
content:
AWS re:Invent 2024 Watch on demand
|
Amazon Web Services
Overview
2024 Videos
Subscribe
Watch on demand
Hear insights from AWS and industry-thought leaders, grow your skills, and get inspired. Watch re:Invent 2024 video on demand.
Keynotes
Innovation talks
Breakout sessions
Keynotes
Monday Night Live with Peter DeSantis
SVP, Utility Computing, AWS
In Monday Night Live 2024, Peter DeSantis, Senior Vice President of AWS Utility Computing, continues the Monday Night Live tradition of diving deep into the engineering that powers AWS. Joined by Dave Brown, VP of AWS Compute and Networking, tune in to see a number of innovations across compute, security, storage systems, and AI infrastructure. Featuring customer speaker, Tom Brown, Co-founder and Chief Compute Officer, at Anthropic. Including the launch of Latency-optimized inference options for Amazon Bedrock, announcement of Project Rainier, and reveal of Trainium2 UltraServers.
CEO Keynote with Matt Garman
CEO, AWS
AWS CEO Matt Garman tal

title: AWS re:Invent 2024 Watch on demand  |  Amazon Web Services
content:
AWS re:Invent 2024 Watch on demand
|
Amazon Web Services
Overview
2024 Videos
Subscribe
Watch on demand
Hear insights from AWS and industry-thought leaders, grow your skills, and get inspired. Watch re:Invent 2024 video on demand.
Keynotes
Innovation talks
Breakout sessions
Keynotes
Monday Night Live with Peter DeSantis
SVP, Utility Computing, AWS
In Monday Night Live 2024, Peter DeSantis, Senior Vice President of AWS Utility Computing, continues the Monday Night Live tradition of diving deep into the engineering that powers AWS. Joined by Dave Brown, VP of AWS Compute and Networking, tune in to see a number of innovations across compute, security, storage systems, and AI infrastructure. Featuring customer speaker, Tom Brown, Co-founder and Chief Compute Officer, at Anthropic. Including the launch of Latency-optimized inference options for Amazon Bedrock, announcement of Project Rainier, and reveal of Trainium2 UltraServers.
CEO Keynote with Matt Garman
CEO, AWS
AWS CEO Matt Garman tal

Keynote
AWS Chief Information Security Officer Chris Betz reveals the latest security innovations and shares how businesses of all sizes are building secure, resilient, and scalable solutions with AWS.
Simplifying security at scale
During his 2025 keynote, Chris Betz, AWS CISO, will show how AWS is simplifying security at scale. Through customer examples and architectural patterns, he will showcase how AWS enables you to build inherently resilient applications that can withstand modern threats and scale with your business. Learn how to harness AWS security capabilities and security best practices to build a robust security strategy that works for your business.
When and Where
Tuesday, June 17 | 10:00 – 11:30 AM ET
Pennsylvania Convention Center
Chris Betz
A

Innovation talks
Discover the future of cloud security during deep explorations of emerging trends and breakthrough solutions, led by AWS leaders. Keep checking back—presenters and topics will be updated as they're announced.
Watch the 2024 innovation talks
Explorations of cryptography research  |  SEC204-INT
AWS continues to innovate to help organizations protect data and privacy—both their own and that of their end users. In this talk, hear from the AWS applied cryptography research team about a variety of cutting-edge research areas, including post-quantum cryptography, innovations in homomorphic encryption in use, and privacy preserving techniques that include secure multi-party computation, searchable symmetric cryptography, and more. This mode

AWS 料金のしくみはどのようになっていますか?
AWS では、大半のクラウドサービスについて従量制料金を適用しています。AWS では必要な個々のサービスにのみ、サービスを使用する期間だけお支払いいただき、長期契約や複雑なライセンスは必要ありません。AWS の料金は、水道や電気などの公共料金の支払方法に似ています。サービスを消費した分だけ支払い、サービスの使用を停止したときの追加コストや解約料金はありません。

AWS 料金のしくみはどのようになっていますか?
AWS では、大半のクラウドサービスについて従量制料金を適用しています。AWS では必要な個々のサービスにのみ、サービスを使用する期間だけお支払いいただき、長期契約や複雑なライセンスは必要ありません。AWS の料金は、水道や電気などの公共料金の支払方法に似ています。サービスを消費した分だけ支払い、サービスの使用を停止したときの追加コストや解約料金はありません。

안심하고 워크로드 마이그레이션 및 운영

지속적인 현대화 및 혁신

가까운 곳에서 개최되는 AWS 이벤트 찾기

AWS 요금은 어떻게 작동합니까?
AWS는 방대한 클라우드 서비스에 대해 사용량에 따른 요금 접근 방식을 제공합니다. AWS에서는 장기 계약이나 복잡한 라이선스 없이 필요한 개별 서비스에 대해 사용한 만큼만 비용을 지불하면 됩니다. AWS 요금은 수도세나 전기세와 같은 공과금을 납부하는 방식과 비슷합니다. 사용한 서비스에 대한 요금만 지불하고 사용을 중단하더라도 추가 비용이나 종료 비용이 없습니다.

AWS를 통한 클라우드 컴퓨팅
Amazon Web Services(AWS)는 전 세계적으로 분포한 데이터 센터에서 200개가 넘는 완벽한 기능의 서비스를 제공하는, 세계적으로 가장 포괄적이며, 널리 채택되고 있는 클라우드입니다. 빠르게 성장하는 스타트업, 가장 큰 규모의 엔터프라이즈, 주요 정부 기관을 포함하여 수백만 명의 고객이 AWS를 사용하여 비용을 절감하고, 민첩성을 향상시키고 더 빠르게 혁신하고 있습니다.

요금 견적 요청하기
AWS 요금은 어떻게 작동합니까?
AWS는 방대한 클라우드 서비스에 대해 사용량에 따른 요금 접근 방식을 제공합니다. AWS에서는 장기 계약이나 복잡한 라이선스 없이 필요한 개별 서비스에 대해 사용한 만큼만 비용을 지불하면 됩니다. AWS 요금은 수도세나 전기세와 같은 공과금을 납부하는 방식과 비슷합니다. 사용한 서비스에 대한 요금만 지불하고 사용을 중단하더라도 추가 비용이나 종료 비용이 없습니다.
AWS Pricing Calculator를 사용하여 AWS 클라우드

AWS 定价
AWS 定价
免费试用
请求报价
AWS 定价如何运作？
AWS 针对我们绝大多数的云服务提供按实际使用量付费的定价模式。使用 AWS 时，您只需为您需要的个别服务付费，具体根据您的使用时间计费，且无需签订长期合同或复杂的许可协议。AWS 定价方式与您支付水电费的方式类似。您只需为所使用的服务计费，且停止使用后无需支付额外费用或终止费。
使用 AWS 定价计算器，了解您可以在 AWS 云中实现的成本节省
如何为 AWS 付费？
按实际使用量付费
按实际使用量付费的模式让您可以轻松适应不断变化的业务需求，无需投入过多预算，同时还可提高您对变化的响应能力。采用按实际使用量付费的模式，您可以根据实际需求而非预测来调整业务，从而降低过度预配置或容量不足的风险。

覆盖数百万 AWS 客户
AWS 合作伙伴网络（APN）是一个全球社区，它利用 AWS 的技术、计划、专业知识和工具为客户构建解决方案和服务。
APN 拥有来自 200 多个国家/地区的超过 14 万个合作伙伴，其中 70% 的合作伙伴的总部位于美国境外。* 截至 2024 年 11 月
合作伙伴和 AWS 一起提供创新的解决方案、解决技术挑战、赢得交易，并创造更大的客户价值。

AWS 定价
AWS 定价
免费试用
请求报价
AWS 定价如何运作？
AWS 针对我们绝大多数的云服务提供按实际使用量付费的定价模式。使用 AWS 时，您只需为您需要的个别服务付费，具体根据您的使用时间计费，且无需签订长期合同或复杂的许可协议。AWS 定价方式与您支付水电费的方式类似。您只需为所使用的服务计费，且停止使用后无需支付额外费用或终止费。
使用 AWS 定价计算器，了解您可以在 AWS 云中实现的成本节省
如何为 AWS 付费？
按实际使用量付费
按实际使用量付费的模式让您可以轻松适应不断变化的业务需求，无需投入过多预算，同时还可提高您对变化的响应能力。采用按实际使用量付费的模式，您可以根据实际需求而非预测来调整业务，从而降低过度预配置或容量不足的风险。

助力 AWS 合作伙伴快速取得成功：2025 年提升客户价值的新举措。 阅读博客 »
覆盖数百万 AWS 客户
AWS 合作伙伴网络（APN）是一个全球社区，它利用 AWS 的技术、计划、专业知识和工具为客户构建解决方案和服务。
APN 拥有来自 200 多个国家/地区的超过 14 万个合作伙伴，其中 70% 的合作伙伴的总部位于美国境外。* 截至 2024 年 11 月
合作伙伴和 AWS 一起提供创新的解决方案、解决技术挑战、赢得交易，并创造更大的客户价值。
播放
为什么要成为 AWS 合作伙伴？
创新并扩大您的客户覆盖范围，以提高客户价值和盈利能力。

AWS 控制台移动应用程序
外出时查看资源。
借助适用于 iOS 和 Android 的 Amazon Web Services (AWS) 管理控制台，您可以在手机或平板电脑上轻松、快速地查看和管理您的现有 EC2 实例、负载均衡器、Route 53 托管区域、RDS 实例、Auto Scaling 组、AWS Elastic Beanstalk 应用程序、Amazon DynamoDB 表单、AWS OpsWorks 堆栈和 CloudWatch 警报。此应用程序提供了移动相关任务，是完整 Web 体验的好搭档，各项功能包括：
Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2)：浏览、筛选和搜索实例。查看配置详情、CloudWatch 指标和警报以及状态检查项目。执行实例生命周期操作：开始、停止、重启、终止。查看数据块设备和创建卷快照。管理安全组规则和弹性 IP 地址。
Elastic Load

AWS 定價
AWS 定價
免費試用
請求定價報價
AWS 定價的運作方式？
AWS 為您提供一種依用量計費的方式，來為我們的絕大多數雲端服務定價。使用 AWS 時，您只為所需的個別服務和使用的時間付費，無須長期合約或複雜的授權。AWS 定價就與您支付水電費的方式一樣。您只支付所使用服務的費用，一旦停止使用，就不會有額外費用或終止費用。
了解您可以使用 AWS 定價計算器在 AWS 雲端節省多少錢
AWS 的付費方式？
按用量付費
按用量付費可讓您輕鬆適應千變萬化的商業需求，而不用過度投入預算，還能加強您對變化的回應能力。有了按用量付費的模式，您能根據需求而不是預測來調整業務，這樣可以降低風險，而不會過度佈建或容量不足。
閱讀其他資訊 »

接觸數百萬 AWS 客戶
AWS 合作夥伴網路 (APN) 是一個全球社群，利用 AWS 技術、方案、專業知識和工具為客戶建立解決方案和服務。
APN 擁有來自 200 多個國家和地區超過 140,000+ 個合作夥伴，其中 70% 總部位於美國以外。*截至 2024 年 11 月
透過合作，合作夥伴和 AWS 可以提供創新解決方案、解決技術挑戰、贏得交易並為共同的客戶創造價值。

在 AWS 上實現更多可能
利用深厚的技術專業知識、實作支援和創新的解決方案，協助您在 AWS 上設計、建置、保護和操作，以加速轉型。
專業服務，步步為營
為團隊賦能
我們為組織提供最新的雲端技能和憑證，協助您充分發揮雲端投資的效益並加速創新。
安心無虞地遷移和操作工作負載
我們透過久經考驗的指引和策略，支援您進行工作負載遷移和持續營運，讓貴企業得以取得長期成功。
持續現代化和創新
我們持續不懈地專注於協助您不斷實現現代化和創新，以便您滿足客戶的需求並提升價值。
自動化並整合安全性
我們協助您將安全與合規轉化為業務推動因素，以便您管理風險、降低成本並提高恢復能力，同時加速創新。

我的活動
AWS 活動與網路研討會
AWS 舉辦各種線上和現場活動，讓雲端運算社群的成員聚集在一起，與 AWS 專家交流、協作及學習。
尋找您所在地區附近的 AWS 活動
AWS re:Invent 是針對全球雲端運算社群舉辦的學習會議。該活動提供重大發表公告、培訓和認證機會，包括 2,500 多場技術會議、合作夥伴博覽會、工作以外的活動等等。
進一步了解 »
立即報名 »
在此觀看 2018 年所有分組會議 »
AWS re:Inforce 是為期兩天的付費會議，內容以雲端安全為主。出席者有兩天的時間，可透過安全、身分與合規內容的會議學習。
進一步了解 »
在此觀看 2019 年所有分組會議 »
AWS 高峰會是為期一到兩天的免費活動，該活動將雲端運算社群結合在一起，以互相交流、協作和學習 AWS 的相關知識。
尋找您所在地區附近的 AWS 高峰會 »

AWS 定價
AWS 定價
免費試用
請求定價報價
AWS 定價的運作方式？
AWS 為您提供一種依用量計費的方式，來為我們的絕大多數雲端服務定價。使用 AWS 時，您只為所需的個別服務和使用的時間付費，無須長期合約或複雜的授權。AWS 定價就與您支付水電費的方式一樣。您只支付所使用服務的費用，一旦停止使用，就不會有額外費用或終止費用。
了解您可以使用 AWS 定價計算器在 AWS 雲端節省多少錢
AWS 的付費方式？
按用量付費
按用量付費可讓您輕鬆適應千變萬化的商業需求，而不用過度投入預算，還能加強您對變化的回應能力。有了按用量付費的模式，您能根據需求而不是預測來調整業務，這樣可以降低風險，而不會過度佈建或容量不足。

接觸數百萬 AWS 客戶
AWS 合作夥伴網路 (APN) 是一個全球社群，利用 AWS 技術、方案、專業知識和工具為客戶建立解決方案和服務。
APN 擁有來自 200 多個國家和地區超過 140,000+ 個合作夥伴，其中 70% 總部位於美國以外。*截至 2024 年 11 月
透過合作，合作夥伴和 AWS 可以提供創新解決方案、解決技術挑戰、贏得交易並為共同的客戶創造價值。
播放

AWS 主控台行動應用程式
在外出時檢視您的資源。
適用於 iOS 和 Android 的 Amazon Web Services (AWS) 管理主控台可以讓您在手機或平板電腦上快速且輕鬆地檢視和管理現有的 EC2 執行個體、負載平衡器、Route 53 託管區域、RDS 執行個體、Auto Scaling 群組、AWS Elastic Beanstalk 應用程式、Amazon DynamoDB 表、AWS OpsWorks 堆疊以及 CloudWatch 警示。此應用程式提供了有助於實現完整 Web 體驗的行動相關任務，包括：
Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2)：瀏覽、篩選和搜尋執行個體。檢視設定詳細資訊、CloudWatch 指標和警示以及狀態檢查。執行執行個體生命週期操作：開始、停止、重新啟動、終止。檢視區塊型儲存設備和建立磁碟區快照。管理安全群組規則和彈性 IP 地址。
Elastic Load Balan

What is AWS Sign-In? - AWS Sign-InWhat is AWS Sign-In? - AWS Sign-InDocumentationAWS Sign-InUser GuideTerminologyRegion availabilitySign-in eventsWhat is AWS Sign-In?This guide helps you understand the different ways that you can sign in to Amazon Web Services
(AWS), depending on what type of user you are. For more information about how to sign in based
on your user type and the AWS resources that you want to access, see one of the following
tutorials.
Sign in to the AWS Management Console
Sign in to the AWS access portal
Sign in as a federated identity
Sign in through the AWS Command Line Interface
Sign in with AWS Builder ID
If you're having issues signing in to your AWS account, see Troubleshooting AWS account sign-in
issues. For
help with your AWS Builder ID see Troubleshooting AWS Builder ID issues. Looking to create an AWS account?
Sign up for AWS. For
more information about how signing up for AWS can help you or your organization, see Contact Us.TopicsTerminologyRegion availabil

See all new and updated Knowledge Center articles published in the last month and re:Post’s top contributors./利用規約lg.../re:Post 利用規約最終更新日: 2023年7月11日AWSre:Postを使用することにより、AWSre:Postコミュニティガイドライン、本利用規約、およびAWSカスタマー契約(総称して「適用条件」)が、AWSre:Postの使用に適用されることに同意したものとみなされます。既にAWSを利用されているお客様の場合、AWSカスタマー契約とは、Amazon Web Services, Inc.およびその関連会社とのAWSサービスの使用に関する既存の契約を意味します。また現在、AWSを利用されていない場合、オンラインの利用規約AWSカスタマー規約を意味します。本利用規約は、AWSカスタマー契約の条項を補足するものですが、両者の間に矛盾が生じる場合は、AWSカスタマー契約の条項が優先されます。AWSは、AWS re:Post上で利用可能なコンテンツを監視および削除し、適用条件の違反を含め、ユーザーのAWS re:Postへのアクセスを拒否または強制終了することができます。お客様の投稿。 お客様は、投稿が準拠規約に違反していないことを確認することを含め、AWS re:Postに投稿するコンテンツについて責任を負うものとします。AWSは独自の裁量でディスカッションスレ

content: Discover AWS Official Knowledge Center Articles | AWS re:PostAWS re:Post을(를) 사용하면 다음에 동의하게 됩니다. AWS re:Post 이용 약관re:Post검색한국어EnglishDeutschEspañolFrançaisItaliano日本語한국어Português中文 (简体)中文 (繁體)리소스로그인홈질문지식 센터기사셀렉션태그주제커뮤니티 그룹AWS 지원 공식AWS 신뢰 및 안전 센터질문하기Knowledge Center Monthly Newsletter - March 2025Stay up to date with the latest from the Knowledge Center. See all new and updated Knowledge Center articles published in the last month and re:Post’s top contributors./지식 센터AWS re:Post에는 AWS 고객으로부터 받는 가장 자주 묻는 질문과 요청을 다루는 AWS 공식 지식 센터 기사 및 비디오가 포함되어 있습니다.모든 지식 센터 콘텐츠 찾아보기추천 기능1 / 9버킷 간에 복제를 설정해도 Amazon S3 객체가 복제되지 않는 이유는 무엇입니까?AWS 공식업데이트됨 4달 전Amazon Simple Storage Service(S3) 버킷 간에 크로스 리전 복제(CRR) 또는 동일 리전 복제(SRR)를 설정했습니다. 그런데 객체가 대상 버킷에 복제되지 않습니다.지식 센터Amazon Simple Storage ServiceEC2 인스턴스에 연결할 수 없는 이유는 무엇인가요?AWS 공식업데이트됨 2년 전Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud(Amazon EC2) 인스턴스에 연결하려고 하면 오류가 발생합니다.지식 센터Amazon EC2WindowsLinux일시 중지된 AWS 계정을 다시 활성화하려면 어떻게 해야 하나요?AWS 공식업데이트됨 일 년 전일시 중지된 계정과 AWS 서비스에 다시 액세스하

title: Access AWS Expert Solutions & Authoritative Knowledge - AWS re:Post | AWS re:Post
content: Access AWS Expert Solutions & Authoritative Knowledge - AWS re:Post | AWS re:PostAWS re:Post을(를) 사용하면 다음에 동의하게 됩니다. AWS re:Post 이용 약관re:Post검색한국어EnglishDeutschEspañolFrançaisItaliano日本語한국어Português中文 (简体)中文 (繁體)리소스로그인홈질문지식 센터기사셀렉션태그주제커뮤니티 그룹AWS 지원 공식AWS 신뢰 및 안전 센터질문하기Knowledge Center Monthly Newsletter - March 2025Stay up to date with the latest from the Knowledge Center. See all new and updated Knowledge Center articles published in the last month and re:Post’s top contributors.AWS re:Post에 오신 것을 환영합니다.re:Post(은)는 AWS에서 더 성공할 수 있도록 큐레이션된 지식과 활발한 커뮤니티에 대한 액세스를 제공합니다.답변 찾기동료, AWS 및 전문가 조언으로 어려움을 극복하세요.지식 센터 이용기술 및 계정 문제 해결모범 사례 활용문서로 장애물 제거엄선된 지식 이용엄선된 선택으로 더 빠르게 배우고 빌드하기그룹 가입AWS 파트너 및 직원과 연결인기 주제 팔로우하기모두 보기서버리스 51311 4454팔로우보안, 신원 및 규정 준수 85344 3907팔로우AWS Well-Architected 프레임워크 227 3671팔로우컨테이너 31265 3564팔로우컴퓨팅 231635 3425팔로우TOP 기여자모두 보기순위이름총 포인트1Riku_Kobayashi64,6752Oleksii Bebych25,0773Gary Mclean21,0604Giovanni Lauria19,4665Adeleke Adebowale Julius15,856최근 질문모두 보기1 / 18S3에서 삭제한 파일 복구

title: Access AWS Expert Solutions & Authoritative Knowledge - AWS re:Post | AWS re:Post
content: Access AWS Expert Solutions & Authoritative Knowledge - AWS re:Post | AWS re:PostAo usar o AWS re:Post, você concorda com os AWS re:Post Termos de usore:PostPesquisarPortuguêsEnglishDeutschEspañolFrançaisItaliano日本語한국어Português中文 (简体)中文 (繁體)RecursosFazer loginPágina inicialPerguntasCentro de ConhecimentoArtigosSeleçõesTagsTópicosGrupos da comunidadeSuporte AWS OficialAWS Trust & Safety CenterFazer uma perguntaKnowledge Center Monthly Newsletter - March 2025Stay up to date with the latest from the Knowledge Center. See all new and updated Knowledge Center articles published in the last month and re:Post’s top contributors.Bem-vindo(a) a AWS re:Postre:Post fornece acesso a conhecimentos selecionados e a uma comunidade vibrante que ajuda você a ter ainda mais sucesso na AWSPesquisar respostasDestrave com conselhos de colegas, da AWS e de especialistasAcessar o Centro de ConhecimentoSolucionar problemas técnicos e de contaReutilizar práticas recomendadasRemover obstáculos com artigosAcessa

title: Sign in to the AWS Management Console - AWS Sign-In
content:
Sign in to the AWS Management Console - AWS Sign-InSign in to the AWS Management Console - AWS Sign-InDocumentationAWS Sign-InUser GuideSign in to the AWS Management ConsoleWhen you sign in to the AWS Management Console from the main AWS sign-in URL (https://console.aws.amazon.com/) you must choose your user type, either Root user or IAM user. If you're not sure
what kind of user you are, see Determine your user type. The root user has unrestricted account access and is associated with the person who created the
AWS account. The root user then creates other types of users, such as IAM users and
users in AWS IAM Identity Center, and assigns them access credentials.An IAM user
is an identity within your AWS account that has specific custom permissions. When an IAM user
signs in, they can use a sign-in URL that includes their AWS account or alias, such as
https://account_alias_or_id.signin.aws.amazon.com/console/
instead of the main AWS sign in URL https://console.aws.amazon.com/.You can

Overview
Jobs
Life
About us
Launched in 2006, Amazon Web Services (AWS) began exposing key infrastructure services to businesses in the form of web services -- now widely known as cloud computing. The ultimate benefit of cloud computing, and AWS, is the ability to leverage a new business model and turn capital infrastructure expenses into variable costs. Businesses no longer need to plan and procure servers and other IT resources weeks or months in advance. Using AWS, businesses can take advantage of Amazon's expertise and economies of scale to access resources when their business needs them, delivering results faster and at a lower cost.

Certification›
Schedule an exam

Schedule your exam
AWS Certifications
AWS Certifications validate AWS Cloud knowledge, skills, and expertise. Candidates can earn Foundational, role-based, or Specialty certifications by passing proctored exams which maintain a high standard.
AWS Certification exams are available globally through Pearson VUE with flexible exam options. Candidates should identify the most convenient testing location and accommodations based on their needs.
Testing options
Online proctoring
Testing centers
Online proctoring
Online proctoring is a testing environment that allows you to take an exam from any private space, such as your home or office. You use your own c

What IT leaders say about having AWS Certified staff:
90%
increased productivity
86%
improved the security of cloud workloads

increased innovation

improved cloud-focused staff retention
Exam vouchers
Signal the value of skills advancement by funding AWS Certifications
Support your team
Supporting your team in getting AWS Certified can help you meet your goals to build faster, improve security, reduce downtime, improve deployment time, and innovate with AWS services.1 Set a goal for certification in your organization and kick start cloud learning by providing exam vouchers to team members.1 Source: ESG Research Insights Paper Commissioned by AWS, Understanding the Value of AWS

title: AWS | Community | AWS Student Hub | AWS Cloud Clubs
content: AWS | Community | AWS Student Hub | AWS Cloud ClubsMenuSearch for contentCtrl KHomeTagsFeatured SpacesAmazon QCost OptimizationDevOpsGenerative AIKubernetesLivestreamsResilienceSaaSTraining and CertificationCommunity ProgramsAWS HeroesAWS Community BuildersAWS User GroupsAWS Cloud Clubs for StudentsEventsre:CapsBuilder ID BenefitsSite Terms, Privacy, and more.Welcome to the Student HubAWS Cloud Club Captains are student leaders who guide and manage their campus Cloud Clubs with support from the AWS Community team. Captains play a vital role in growing club membership, organizing technical events, and supporting local community initiatives.By leading events focused on learning, Captains can unlock valuable benefits for themselves and their community. These benefits include AWS credits, AWS certification exam vouchers, branded items, mentorship opportunities with AWS professionals, and more.Becoming a Cloud Club Captain allows you to develop your leadership skills while building a thrivi

title: AWS account root user - AWS Identity and Access Management
content:
AWS account root user - AWS Identity and Access ManagementAWS account root user - AWS Identity and Access ManagementDocumentationAWS Identity and Access ManagementUser GuideCentrally manage root access for member
accountsTasks that require root user credentialsAdditional resourcesAWS account root userWhen you first create an Amazon Web Services (AWS) account, you begin with a single sign-in identity
that has complete access to all AWS services and resources in the account. This identity is
called the AWS account root user. The email address and password that you
used to create your AWS account are the credentials you use to sign in as your root user.
Use the root user only to perform the tasks that require root-level permissions.
For the complete list of tasks that require you to sign in as the root user, see Tasks that require root user credentials.
Follow the root user best practices for your
AWS account.
If you're having trouble signing in, see Sign in to the
AWS Management Console.

title: Signing in to multiple accounts - AWS Management Console
content:
Signing in to multiple accounts - AWS Management ConsoleSigning in to multiple accounts - AWS Management ConsoleDocumentationGetting Started GuideSigning in to multiple accountsYou can sign in to up to five different identities simultaneously in a single web browser in the AWS Management Console. These can be any combination of root, IAM, or federated roles in different accounts or in the same account.
Each identity you sign in to opens its own instance of the AWS Management Console in a new tab.When you enable multi-session support, the console URL contains a subdomain (for example, https://000000000000-aaaaaaaa.us-east-1.console.aws.amazon.com/console/home?region=us-east-1).
Be sure to update your bookmarks and console links.NoteYou must opt-in to multi-session support by choosing Turn on multi-session in the account menu in the AWS Management Console, or by choosing Enable multi-session
on https://console.aws.amazon.com/. You can opt-out of multi-sessions at any time by choosing Dis

title: Determine your user type - AWS Sign-In
content:
Determine your user type - AWS Sign-InDetermine your user type - AWS Sign-InDocumentationAWS Sign-InUser GuideRoot userIAM userIAM Identity Center userFederated identityAWS Builder ID userDetermine your user typeHow you sign in depends on what type of AWS user you are. You can manage an
AWS account as a root user, an IAM user, a user in IAM Identity Center, or a federated identity. You can
use an AWS Builder ID profile to access certain AWS services and tools. The different user types
are listed below.TopicsRoot userIAM userIAM Identity Center userFederated identityAWS Builder ID user
Root user
Also referred to as the account owner or account root user. As the root user, you have
complete access to all AWS services and resources in your AWS account. When you first
create an AWS account, you begin with a single sign-in identity that has complete access
to all AWS services and resources in the account. This identity is the AWS account
root user. You can sign in as the root user using the

title: MFA enabled sign-in - AWS Identity and Access Management
content:
MFA enabled sign-in - AWS Identity and Access ManagementMFA enabled sign-in - AWS Identity and Access ManagementDocumentationAWS Identity and Access ManagementUser GuideMultiple MFA devices enabledFIDO security keyVirtual MFA deviceHardware TOTP tokenMFA enabled sign-inUsers who are configured with multi-factor authentication
(MFA) devices must use their MFA devices to sign in to the AWS Management Console. After the user
enters their sign-in credentials, AWS checks the user's account to see if MFA is required for
that user. ImportantIf you use access key and secret key credentials for direct AWS Management Console access with the AWS STS
GetFederationToken API call, MFA will NOT be required. For more
information, see Using access keys and secret key
credentials for console access.The following topics provide information on how users complete signing in when MFA is
required. TopicsMultiple MFA devices enabledFIDO security keyVirtual MFA deviceHardware TOTP token
Multiple MFA devices en

title: AWS Multi-factor authentication in IAM - AWS Identity and Access Management
content:
AWS Multi-factor authentication in IAM - AWS Identity and Access ManagementAWS Multi-factor authentication in IAM - AWS Identity and Access ManagementDocumentationAWS Identity and Access ManagementUser GuideMFA typesMFA recommendationsAdditional resourcesAWS Multi-factor authentication in IAMFor increased security, we recommend that you configure multi-factor authentication (MFA) to
help protect your AWS resources. You can enable MFA for the AWS account root user of all AWS accounts,
including standalone accounts, management accounts, and member accounts, as well as for your
IAM users.While MFA is enforced for root users by default, it requires customer action to add MFA
during the initial account creation or as prompted during sign-in. For example, AWS requires
that you register MFA for the root user of your organization's management account within the first
35 days of signing in. For more information, see Secure your Organizations account root user credentials. When you enable MFA fo

Description
The AWS Console Mobile Application, provided by Amazon Web Services, lets you view and manage a select set of resources and receive push notifications to stay informed and connected with your AWS resources while on-the-go.The Console Mobile Application allows you to configure and receive push notifications for AWS services, monitor resources through a dedicated dashboard, and view configuration details, metrics, and alarms for select AWS services. The Dashboard provides permitted users with an overview of the account status, with real-time data on Amazon CloudWatch, AWS Health Dashboard, AWS Billing and Cost Management, and Recently Visited Services. AWS Console Mobile Application
Stay connected to your AWS resources on the go
Download the Console Mobile Application
The AWS Console Mobile Application, provided by Amazon Web Services, lets you view and manage a select set of resources and receive push notifications to stay informed and connected with your AWS resources while on-the-go.
What is the Console Mobile Application?
The Console Mobile Application allows you to configure and receive push notifications for AWS services, monitor resources through a dedicated dashboard, and view configuration details, metrics, and alarms for select AWS services.

title: AWS security credentials - AWS Identity and Access Management
content:
AWS security credentials - AWS Identity and Access ManagementAWS security credentials - AWS Identity and Access ManagementDocumentationAWS Identity and Access ManagementUser GuideSecurity considerationsAWS security credentialsWhen you interact with AWS, you specify your AWS security
credentials to verify who you are and whether you have permission to access the
resources that you are requesting. AWS uses the security credentials to authenticate and
authorize your requests.For example, if you want to download a protected file from an Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket, your
credentials must allow that access. If your credentials don't show you are authorized to
download the file, AWS denies your request. However, your AWS security credentials aren't
required for you to download a file in an Amazon S3 bucket that is publicly shared.There are different types of users in AWS, each with their own security credentials:
Account owner (root user) â The user who created
the AWS

首页  »  亚马逊云科技解决方案  »  安全与合规  »  网络安全等级保护
网络安全等级保护
联系亚马逊云科技专家
注册立享免费套餐
什么是等保合规?
“网络安全等级保护简称"等保"。
基本概念
根据《网络安全法》的规定，网络运营者应当按照网络安全等级保护制度的要求，履行安全保护义务。
等级保护对象
网络安全等级保护工作直接作用的对象注：主要包括信息系统、通信网络设施和数据资源等
亚马逊云科技合规性
亚马逊云科技中国（北京）区域和亚马逊云科技中国（宁夏）区域通过独立的第三方机构验证其标准符合能力，已经完成了
等级保护三级测评。
网络安全等级保护划分要求
等保一级
等级保护对象受到破坏后，会对相关公民、法人和其他组织的合法权益造成一般损害，但不危害国家安全、社会秩序和公共利益。
等保二级
等级保护对象受到破坏后，会对相关公民、法人和其他组织的合法权益造成严重损害或特别严重损害，或者对社会秩序和公共利益造成危害，但不危害国家安全。
等保三级
等级保护对象受到破坏后，会对社会秩序和公共利益造成严重危害，或者对国家安全造成危害。
等保四级
等级保护对象受到破坏后，会对社会秩

title: Sign in with AWS Builder ID - AWS Sign-In
content:
Sign in with AWS Builder ID - AWS Sign-InSign in with AWS Builder ID - AWS Sign-InDocumentationAWS Sign-InUser GuideRegion availabilitySign in with AWS Builder IDAWS Builder ID is a personal profile that provides access to select tools and services including
Amazon CodeCatalyst, Amazon Q Developer, and AWS Training and Certification. AWS Builder ID represents
you as an individual and is independent from any credentials and data you may have in existing
AWS accounts. Like other personal profiles, AWS Builder ID remains with you as you progress through
your personal, educational, and career goals.Your AWS Builder ID complements any AWS accounts you may already own or want to create. While an
AWS account acts as a container for AWS resources you create and provides a security boundary
for those resources, your AWS Builder ID represents you as an individual. For more information, see
AWS Builder ID and other AWS credentials.AWS Builder ID is free. You only pay for the AWS resources you con

預約傾下偈
為突破而生
AWS Innovate 錄影內容現已上線，歡迎登入活動平台觀看 (觀看時間至 2025 年 6 月 11 日)。探索 AWS 如何協助你發揮生成式 AI 和數據的潛力。
登入活動平台
立即登記
需要協助登入活動？
我無法收到密碼設置郵件，該怎麼辦？
點擊下方「重設密碼」並輸入您註冊的電子信箱來設置密碼。您可以在3月13日下午1:00後使用密碼登入。

Connect with AWS security experts, partners, and peers at AWS re:Inforce.
Overview
Career-changing
connections
AWS re:Inforce is more than just learning about the latest security launches and growing your skills—it’s about connecting with like-minded people who are on a similar cloud journey. From problem-solving with AWS Partners at the Expo to connecting with security experts and peers during small-group meetups, get ready to expand your global network.
Expo
Welcome reception
Monday, June 16 | 4:30 PM – 6:30 PM
Interact with the latest AWS security innovations. More than 70 trusted AWS partners will be on hand to answer questions and help bolster your security portfolio.

All Builders Welcome
Applications for the All Builders Welcome Grant are now open
It’s all about you: Innovative builders changing the world through tech
Overview
Amazon Web Services (AWS) is dedicated to building the next generation of technical leaders. The All Builders Welcome Grant creates pathways into cloud technology, bringing together diverse perspectives that fuel innovation. This program expands opportunities for builders to develop and influence the next generation of technology.
The All Builders Welcome Grant is for builders in the first five years of their career. It removes the financial barrier to attend AWS re:Inforce 2025 June 16 – 18 in Philadelphia, PA. This event provides immersive opportunities to learn, network, and build

Why attend
Expand your skills and knowledge
Attending AWS re:Inforce is a great way to enhance both your career and your team back home.
At re:Inforce 2025, you will:
Work directly with the AWS security experts who designed the services you use every day. These one-on-one interactions will give you the advice and strategies you need to transform your security program.
Learn what’s most valuable to you with more than 250 AWS security-focused sessions. The majority of sessions are offered at the advanced or expert level, and formats include interactive workshops, small-group solution building, hands-on labs, and technical deep-dives.
Collaborate directly with A

Accessibility
Is re:Inforce accessible?
The following services are available to everyone onsite, with no advanced request required:
Accessible seating
All-gender restrooms
Assistive listening devices
Lactation room
Live captioning
Reflection room
Translations for keynote
These additional services can be requested in advance:
ASL (American Sign Language)
Halal, Kosher, and vegan meals
Mobility device rental
Sighted guide
Learn more about your options on the accessibility services page. To request any of these services or inquire about a service you don't see listed, contact customer support. To pro

Accessibility services
AWS is committed to driving awareness of and influencing improvements in accessibility across all events.
Services available to all attendees
Accessible seating
Designated accessible seating is available in keynote, innovation talks, breakout sessions, lightning talks, and chalk talks for attendees who are Blind, low vision, or Deaf, and attendees who use a mobility device.
For workshops, code talks, and builders’ sessions an ambassador will be available in conference rooms to assist with seating.
All-gender restrooms
All-gender restrooms will be available throughout the event.
Assistive listening devices
Assistive listening devices will be available in the keynote, innovation talks, breakout sessions, lightning talks,

title: The Official AWS Podcast: Questions or Feedback
content:
The Official AWS Podcast: Questions or Feedback
The Official AWS Podcast
Audio Feedback and Questions
We welcome listeners of the Official AWS Podcast to upload a question or feedback for potential inclusion in the Official AWS Podcast. All or part of the audio may then be used on the podcast, and that your approval to do so is given by uploading your audio using this page. Please make sure the audio includes your name and/or organization,
and whether you want that information to be mentioned or not. Note: uploading audio does not guarantee it is used in the podcast.
By submitting your audio file (the âRecordingsâ), you grant to Amazon Web Services, Inc. and its affiliates (collectively, âAWSâ) an irrevocable, nonexclusive, perpetual, worldwide, royalty-free right and license to use, reproduce, modify, distribute, and translate all or any part of the Recordings and to use your name and voice in connection with the Official AWS Podcast.
Upload Audio

Latest Episode
The Official AWS Podcast is a podcast for developers and IT professionals looking for the latest news and trends in storage, security, infrastructure, serverless, and more. Join Simon Elisha and Hawn Nguyen-Loughren for regular updates, deep dives, launches, and interviews. Whether youâre training machine learning models, developing open source projects, or building cloud solutions, the Official AWS Podcast has something for you.

New game-changing AI developments are here, from SageMaker Unified Studio to Bedrock's new multi-agent capabilities. Join your hosts Simon and Jillian for the latest updates from AWS.

title: Determine your user type - AWS Sign-In
content:
Determine your user type - AWS Sign-InDetermine your user type - AWS Sign-InDocumentationAWS Sign-InUser GuideRoot userIAM userIAM Identity Center userFederated identityAWS Builder ID userDetermine your user typeHow you sign in depends on what type of AWS user you are. You can manage an
AWS account as a root user, an IAM user, a user in IAM Identity Center, or a federated identity. You can
use an AWS Builder ID profile to access certain AWS services and tools. The different user types
are listed below.TopicsRoot userIAM userIAM Identity Center userFederated identityAWS Builder ID user
Root user
Also referred to as the account owner or account root user. As the root user, you have
complete access to all AWS services and resources in your AWS account. When you first
create an AWS account, you begin with a single sign-in identity that has complete access
to all AWS services and resources in the account. This identity is the AWS account
root user. You can sign in as the root user using the

title: Sign in to the AWS Management Console as the root user - AWS Sign-In
content:
Sign in to the AWS Management Console as the root user - AWS Sign-InSign in to the AWS Management Console as the root user - AWS Sign-InDocumentationAWS Sign-InUser GuideTo sign in as the root userAdditional informationSign in to the AWS Management Console as the
root userWhen you first create an AWS account, you begin with one sign-in identity that has complete access to all AWS services
and resources in the account. This identity is called the AWS account root user and is accessed by
signing in with the email address and password that you used to create the account.ImportantWe strongly recommend that you don't use the root user for your everyday tasks. Safeguard your root user credentials and use them to
perform the tasks that only the root user can perform. For the complete list of tasks that require you to sign in as the root user, see Tasks that require root user credentials in the IAM User Guide.
To sign in as the root user
You can sign in as the root user while you are already s

title: AWS サインイン認証情報のトラブルシューティング | AWS re:Post
content:
AWS サインイン認証情報のトラブルシューティング | AWS re:PostAWS re:Postを使用することにより、以下に同意したことになります AWS re:Post 利用規約re:Post検索日本語EnglishDeutschEspañolFrançaisItaliano日本語한국어Português中文 (简体)中文 (繁體)リソースサインインホーム質問情報センター記事セレクションタグトピックコミュニティグループAWS サポートオフィシャルAWS Trust & Safetyセンター質問するKnowledge Center Monthly Newsletter - March 2025Stay up to date with the latest from the Knowledge Center. See all new and updated Knowledge Center articles published in the last month and re:Post’s top contributors./認証情報が機能しない場合、AWS アカウントにサインインする方法を教えてください。lg.../認証情報が機能しない場合、AWS アカウントにサインインする方法を教えてください。所要時間1分0サインインしようとしましたが、認証情報が受け付けられませんでした。または、AWS ルートユーザーアカウントにアクセスするための認証情報がありません。解決策
**注:**AWS サポートでは、サインインしているアカウント以外の AWS アカウントの詳細について話し合うことはできません。AWS サポートは、理由の如何を問わず、アカウントに関連付けられている認証情報を変更することはできません。
以下のシナリオでは、アカウントの認証情報に問題が発生することがよくあります。
AWS アカウントのルートユーザーがアカウント管理者ではなくなり、連絡が取れなくなります。メールアドレスが無効なため、パスワードをリセットできません。
アカウントのパスワードを忘れました。または、アカウントのメールアドレスを確認する必要があります。
間違った認証情報を使用してサインインします。たとえば、間違ったアカウントの認証情報や AWS ID とアクセス管理 (IAM) の IDを使用しまし

Generative AI is a set of artificial intelligence (AI) systems and models designed to generate
content such as code, text, images, music, or other forms of data. These systems can produce new
content based on patterns and knowledge learned from existing data. Increasingly, organizations
and businesses are using generative AI to:

databases, analytics, networking, mobile, developer tools, management tools, IoT, security, and
enterprise applications: on-demand, available in seconds, with pay-as-you-go pricing. From data
warehousing to deployment tools, directories to content delivery, over 200 AWS services are
available.New services can be provisioned quickly, without the upfront fixed expense. This allows
enterprises, start-ups, small and medium-sized businesses, and customers in the public sector to
access the building blocks they need to respond quickly to changing business requirements. This

From newsworthy keynotes to career-changing sessions and connections, re:Invent 2024 was an amazing success—and we can’t wait to do it again. Registration for re:Invent 2025 opens this summer. Subscribe for updates.
